casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Aaron Lee GORDON 312P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 21, 2018 Michele A. Goldman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Gordon, Aaron Lee

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General

Joseph Finarelli, Special Deputy Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of September 2018."
